version_description:
1.0.8 caused problems for some of you on 5.x. Our apologies we couldn't get the fix in to 1.0.9 but it is fixed now! 

As always if there is a feature you would really like to see or something not working quite how you expect, please let us know! Drop us a line at support@kronosgo.com, we're here to help and we would love to hear from you. 

Thank you all so much for your continued positive ratings and reviews. Your support is truly appreciated!

1.0.13 fixes a bug that prevented some of you from enjoying Vs mode after you updated to 1.0.12. 

As always if there is a feature you would really like to see or something not working quite how you expect, please let us know! Drop us a line at support@kronosgo.com, we're here to help and we would love to hear from you. 

Thank you all so much for your continued positive ratings and reviews. Your support is truly appreciated!

1.0.14 includes some bug fixes particularly for those players on iPad. 

As always if there is a feature you would really like to see or something not working quite how you expect, please let us know! Drop us a line at support@kronosgo.com, we're here to help and we would love to hear from you. 

Thank you all so much for your continued positive ratings and reviews. Your support is truly appreciated!

1.0.15 includes some bug fixes and updates for iOS 7.x. 

As always if there is a feature you would really like to see or something not working quite how you expect, please let us know! Drop us a line at support@kronosgo.com, we're here to help and we would love to hear from you. 

Thank you all so much for your continued positive ratings and reviews. Your support is truly appreciated!

1.0.15 includes some bug fixes and updates for iOS 8.x. 

As always if there is a feature you would really like to see or something not working quite how you expect, please let us know! Drop us a line at support@kronosgo.com, we're here to help and we would love to hear from you. 

Thank you all so much for your continued positive ratings and reviews. Your support is truly appreciated!

Updated with our latest tech for iOS 13.

Should you have any issues, please contact us and we will be happy to help you.
